content: this small doily approx 30 cm/12 in diameter after blocking is a quick and beginner-friendly project you´ll need approx half a ball of infinity hearts lotus 8/4 or similar yarn and 8 small beads the pattern also includes instructions for how to make the edging without beads fully written pattern with photos of some rounds that can be a bit tricky stitches used chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet skill level easy
